body_html:
we have a torch.split: torch.split(torch.randn(3, 5), 1, 0), seems like a good idea to add squeeze=True to the split call, to squeeze out the dimension in question.

and def seems like either torch.cat needs an unsqueeze option, or torch.join...
body_text:
we have a torch.split: torch.split(torch.randn(3, 5), 1, 0), seems like a good idea to add squeeze=True to the split call, to squeeze out the dimension in question.
and def seems like either torch.cat needs an unsqueeze option, or torch.join...
body:
we have a torch.split: `torch.split(torch.randn(3, 5), 1, 0)`, seems like a good idea to add squeeze=True to the split call, to squeeze out the dimension in question.

and def seems like either torch.cat needs an unsqueeze option, or torch.join...
